1: וְיוֹסֵ֖ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>And Joseph</n> הוּרַ֣ד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>was brought down</n> מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <sup>4714 </sup> <n>to Egypt</n> וַיִּקְנֵ֡הוּ <sup>7069 </sup> <n>bought</n> פּוֹטִיפַר֩ <sup>6318 </sup> <n>and Potiphar</n> סְרִ֨יס <sup>5631 </sup> <n>an officer</n> פַּרְעֹ֜ה <sup>6547 </sup> <n>of Pharaoh</n> שַׂ֤ר <sup>8269 </sup> <n>captain</n> הַטַּבָּחִים֙ <sup>2876 </sup> <n>of the guard</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>an</n> מִצְרִ֔י <sup>4713 </sup> <n>Egyptian</n> מִיַּד֙ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>him of the hands</n> הַיִּשְׁמְעֵאלִ֔ים <sup>3459 </sup> <n>of the Ishmeelites</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> הוֹרִדֻ֖הוּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>which had brought him down</n> שָֽׁמָּה׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n>
2: וַיְהִ֤י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>was with</n> יוֹסֵ֔ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>was with Joseph</n> וַיְהִ֖י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>582 </sup> <n>another</n> מַצְלִ֑יחַ <sup>6743 </sup> <n>and he was a prosperous</n> וַיְהִ֕י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> בְּבֵ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and he was in the house</n> אֲדֹנָ֖יו <sup>113 </sup> <n>of his master</n> הַמִּצְרִֽי׃ <sup>4713 </sup> <n>the Egyptian</n>
3: וַיַּ֣רְא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> אֲדֹנָ֔יו <sup>113 </sup> <n>And his master</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that the LORD</n> אִתּ֑וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>caused</n> וְכֹל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> עֹשֶׂ֔ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>made all that he did</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[was] with him and that the LORD</n> מַצְלִ֥יחַ <sup>6743 </sup> <n>to prosper</n> בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in his hand</n>
4: וַיִּמְצָ֨א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>found</n> יוֹסֵ֥ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>And Joseph</n> חֵ֛ן <sup>2580 </sup> <n>grace</n> בְּעֵינָ֖יו <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in his sight</n> וַיְשָׁ֣רֶת <sup>8334 </sup> <n>and he served</n> אֹת֑וֹ <sup>853 </sup> וַיַּפְקִדֵ֙הוּ֙ <sup>6485 </sup> <n>him and he made him overseer</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> בֵּית֔וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>over his house</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> יֶשׁ־ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>and all [that] he had</n> ל֖וֹ נָתַ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>he put</n> בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>into his hand</n>
5: וַיְהִ֡י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> מֵאָז֩ <sup>227 </sup> <n>And it came to pass from the time</n> הִפְקִ֨יד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>[that] he had made him overseer</n> אֹת֜וֹ <sup>853 </sup> בְּבֵית֗וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>in his house</n> וְעַל֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and over</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> יֶשׁ־ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>and over all that he had</n> ל֔וֹ וַיְבָ֧רֶךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>blessed</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> הַמִּצְרִ֖י <sup>4713 </sup> <n>the Egyptian's</n> בִּגְלַ֣ל <sup>1558 </sup> <n>sake</n> יוֹסֵ֑ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>for Joseph's</n> וַיְהִ֞י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> בִּרְכַּ֤ת <sup>1293 </sup> <n>and the blessing</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> יֶשׁ־ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>was upon all that he had</n> ל֔וֹ בַּבַּ֖יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>in the house</n> וּבַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>and in the field</n>
6: וַיַּעֲזֹ֣ב <sup>5800 </sup> <n>And he left</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>everything</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לוֹ֮ בְּיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>hand</n> יוֹסֵף֒ <sup>3130 </sup> <n>all that he had in Joseph's</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יָדַ֤ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and he knew</n> אִתּוֹ֙ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> מְא֔וּמָה <sup>3972 </sup> <n>not ought</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>he had save</n> הַלֶּ֖חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>the bread</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> אוֹכֵ֑ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>which he did eat</n> וַיְהִ֣י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> יוֹסֵ֔ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>And Joseph</n> יְפֵה־ <sup>3303 </sup> <n>[person] and well</n> תֹ֖אַר <sup>8389 </sup> <n>was [a] goodly</n> וִיפֵ֥ה <sup>3303 </sup> <n>was handsome</n> מַרְאֶֽה׃ <sup>4758 </sup> <n>favoured</n>
7: וַיְהִ֗י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> אַחַר֙ <sup>310 </sup> <n>And it came to pass after</n> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <sup>1697 </sup> <n>these things</n> הָאֵ֔לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> וַתִּשָּׂ֧א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>cast</n> אֵֽשֶׁת־ <sup>802 </sup> <n>wife</n> אֲדֹנָ֛יו <sup>113 </sup> <n>that his master's</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֵינֶ֖יהָ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>her eyes</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>at</n> יוֹסֵ֑ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>upon Joseph</n> וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and she said</n> שִׁכְבָ֥ה <sup>7901 </sup> <n>Lie</n> עִמִּֽי׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n>
8: וַיְמָאֵ֓ן ׀ <sup>3985 </sup> <n>But he refused</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אֵ֣שֶׁת <sup>802 </sup> <n>wife</n> אֲדֹנָ֔יו <sup>113 </sup> <n>unto his master's</n> הֵ֣ן <sup>2005 </sup> <n>Behold</n> אֲדֹנִ֔י <sup>113 </sup> <n>Behold my master</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יָדַ֥ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>wotteth</n> אִתִּ֖י <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>anything</n> בַּבָּ֑יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>not what [is] with me in the house</n> וְכֹ֥ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> יֶשׁ־ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>all that he hath</n> ל֖וֹ נָתַ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and he hath committed</n> בְּיָדִֽי׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>to my hand</n>
9: אֵינֶ֨נּוּ <sup>369 </sup> <n>There</n> גָד֜וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>[There is] none greater</n> בַּבַּ֣יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>in this house</n> הַזֶּה֮ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> מִמֶּנִּי֒ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>than</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>than I neither</n> חָשַׂ֤ךְ <sup>2820 </sup> <n>hath he kept back</n> מִמֶּ֙נִּי֙ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>than</n> מְא֔וּמָה <sup>3972 </sup> <n>any thing</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> אוֹתָ֖ךְ <sup>853 </sup> בַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>from me but thee because</n> אַתְּ־ <sup>859 </sup> <n>thou</n> אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <sup>802 </sup> <n>[art] his wife</n> וְאֵ֨יךְ <sup>349 </sup> <n>How</n> אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֜ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>how then can I do</n> הָרָעָ֤ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>wickedness</n> הַגְּדֹלָה֙ <sup>1419 </sup> <n>this great</n> הַזֹּ֔את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> וְחָטָ֖אתִי <sup>2398 </sup> <n>and sin</n> לֵֽאלֹהִֽים׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>angels</n>
10: וַיְהִ֕י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כְּדַבְּרָ֥הּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>And it came to pass as she spake</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יוֹסֵ֖ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>to Joseph</n> י֣וֹם ׀ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> י֑וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>by day</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> שָׁמַ֥ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>that he hearkened</n> אֵלֶ֛יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to her</n> לִשְׁכַּ֥ב <sup>7901 </sup> <n>not unto her to lie</n> אֶצְלָ֖הּ <sup>681 </sup> <n>by her</n> לִהְי֥וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עִמָּֽהּ׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>now it</n>
11: וַיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>happened</n> כְּהַיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it came to pass about this time</n> הַזֶּ֔ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>one</n> וַיָּבֹ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>that [Joseph] went</n> הַבַּ֖יְתָה <sup>1004 </sup> <n>into the house</n> לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>to do</n> מְלַאכְתּ֑וֹ <sup>4399 </sup> <n>his business</n> וְאֵ֨ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>else</n> אִ֜ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>of the men</n> מֵאַנְשֵׁ֥י <sup>376 </sup> <n>of the men</n> הַבַּ֛יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> שָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>was there</n> בַּבָּֽיִת׃ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>inside</n>
12: וַתִּתְפְּשֵׂ֧הוּ <sup>8610 </sup> <n>And she caught</n> בְּבִגְד֛וֹ <sup>899 </sup> <n>him by his garment</n> לֵאמֹ֖ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> שִׁכְבָ֣ה <sup>7901 </sup> <n>Lie</n> עִמִּ֑י <sup>5973 </sup> <n>and he</n> וַיַּעֲזֹ֤ב <sup>5800 </sup> <n>with me and he left</n> בִּגְדוֹ֙ <sup>899 </sup> <n>his garment</n> בְּיָדָ֔הּ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in her hand</n> וַיָּ֖נָס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>and fled</n> וַיֵּצֵ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and got</n> הַחֽוּצָה׃ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>him out</n>
13: וַיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִּרְאוֹתָ֔הּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when she saw</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עָזַ֥ב <sup>5800 </sup> <n>that he had left</n> בִּגְד֖וֹ <sup>899 </sup> <n>his garment</n> בְּיָדָ֑הּ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in her hand</n> וַיָּ֖נָס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>and was fled</n> הַחֽוּצָה׃ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>forth</n>
14: וַתִּקְרָ֞א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>That she called</n> לְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <sup>376 </sup> <n>to the men</n> בֵיתָ֗הּ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of her house</n> וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and spake</n> לָהֶם֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto them saying</n> רְא֗וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>See</n> הֵ֥בִיא <sup>935 </sup> <n>he hath brought in</n> לָ֛נוּ אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>to the men</n> עִבְרִ֖י <sup>5680 </sup> <n>A Hebrew</n> לְצַ֣חֶק <sup>6711 </sup> <n>unto us to mock</n> בָּ֑נוּ בָּ֤א <sup>935 </sup> <n>us he came in</n> אֵלַי֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> לִשְׁכַּ֣ב <sup>7901 </sup> <n>unto me to lie</n> עִמִּ֔י <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> וָאֶקְרָ֖א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>with me and I cried</n> בְּק֥וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>voice</n> גָּדֽוֹל׃ <sup>1419 </sup> <n>with a loud</n>
15: וַיְהִ֣י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כְשָׁמְע֔וֹ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when he heard</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הֲרִימֹ֥תִי <sup>7311 </sup> <n>that I lifted up</n> קוֹלִ֖י <sup>6963 </sup> <n>my voice</n> וָאֶקְרָ֑א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and cried</n> וַיַּעֲזֹ֤ב <sup>5800 </sup> <n>that he left</n> בִּגְדוֹ֙ <sup>899 </sup> <n>his garment</n> אֶצְלִ֔י <sup>681 </sup> <n>with me</n> וַיָּ֖נָס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>and fled</n> וַיֵּצֵ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and got him</n> הַחֽוּצָה׃ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>out</n>
16: וַתַּנַּ֥ח <sup>3240 </sup> <n>And she laid up</n> בִּגְד֖וֹ <sup>899 </sup> <n>his garment</n> אֶצְלָ֑הּ <sup>681 </sup> <n>by her</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>her until</n> בּ֥וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> אֲדֹנָ֖יו <sup>113 </sup> <n>until his lord</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>home</n>
17: וַתְּדַבֵּ֣ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>And she spake</n> אֵלָ֔יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> כַּדְּבָרִ֥ים <sup>1697 </sup> <n>unto him according to these words</n> הָאֵ֖לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> בָּֽא־ <sup>935 </sup> <n>which thou hast brought</n> אֵלַ֞י <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הָעֶ֧בֶד <sup>5650 </sup> <n>servant</n> הָֽעִבְרִ֛י <sup>5680 </sup> <n>The Hebrew</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> הֵבֵ֥אתָ <sup>935 </sup> <n>unto us came in</n> לָּ֖נוּ לְצַ֥חֶק <sup>6711 </sup> <n>unto me to mock</n> בִּֽי׃
18: וַיְהִ֕י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כַּהֲרִימִ֥י <sup>7311 </sup> <n>And it came to pass as I lifted up</n> קוֹלִ֖י <sup>6963 </sup> <n>my voice</n> וָאֶקְרָ֑א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and cried</n> וַיַּעֲזֹ֥ב <sup>5800 </sup> <n>that he left</n> בִּגְד֛וֹ <sup>899 </sup> <n>his garment</n> אֶצְלִ֖י <sup>681 </sup> <n>with me</n> וַיָּ֥נָס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>and fled</n> הַחֽוּצָה׃ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>out</n>
19: וַיְהִי֩ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> אֲדֹנָ֜יו <sup>113 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when his master</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דִּבְרֵ֣י <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the words</n> אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <sup>802 </sup> <n>of his wife</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> דִּבְּרָ֤ה <sup>1696 </sup> <n>which she spake</n> אֵלָיו֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto him saying</n> כַּדְּבָרִ֣ים <sup>1697 </sup> <n>After this manner</n> הָאֵ֔לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>another</n> עָ֥שָׂהּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>did</n> לִ֖י עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>thy servant</n> וַיִּ֖חַר <sup>2734 </sup> <n>was kindled</n> אַפּֽוֹ׃ <sup>639 </sup> <n>to me that his wrath</n>
20: וַיִּקַּח֩ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>took</n> אֲדֹנֵ֨י <sup>113 </sup> <n>master</n> יוֹסֵ֜ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>And Joseph's</n> אֹת֗וֹ <sup>853 </sup> וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֙הוּ֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>him and put him</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>court</n> הַסֹּ֔הַר <sup>5470 </sup> <n>prison</n> מְק֕וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>a place</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>where</n> [אֲסוּרֵי כ] (אֲסִירֵ֥י <sup>631 </sup> <n>were confined</n> ק) הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>where the king's</n> אֲסוּרִ֑ים <sup>631 </sup> <n>[were] bound</n> וַֽיְהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> שָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>was there</n> בְּבֵ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>court</n> הַסֹּֽהַר׃ <sup>5470 </sup> <n>prison</n>
21: וַיְהִ֤י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>But the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>was with</n> יוֹסֵ֔ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>was with Joseph</n> וַיֵּ֥ט <sup>5186 </sup> <n>and shewed</n> אֵלָ֖יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> חָ֑סֶד <sup>2617 </sup> <n>him mercy</n> וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and gave</n> חִנּ֔וֹ <sup>2580 </sup> <n>him favour</n> בְּעֵינֵ֖י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in the sight</n> שַׂ֥ר <sup>8269 </sup> <n>of the keeper</n> בֵּית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>court</n> הַסֹּֽהַר׃ <sup>5470 </sup> <n>prison</n>
22: וַיִּתֵּ֞ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>committed</n> שַׂ֤ר <sup>8269 </sup> <n>And the keeper</n> בֵּית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>court</n> הַסֹּ֙הַר֙ <sup>5470 </sup> <n>prison</n> בְּיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>hand</n> יוֹסֵ֔ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>to Joseph's</n> אֵ֚ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָ֣אֲסִירִ֔ם <sup>615 </sup> <n>all the prisoners</n> אֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בְּבֵ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>court</n> הַסֹּ֑הַר <sup>5470 </sup> <n>prison</n> וְאֵ֨ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> עֹשִׂים֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and whatsoever they did</n> שָׁ֔ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> הָיָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עֹשֶֽׂה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>there he was the doer</n>
23: אֵ֣ין ׀ <sup>369 </sup> <n>else</n> שַׂ֣ר <sup>8269 </sup> <n>The keeper</n> בֵּית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>court</n> הַסֹּ֗הַר <sup>5470 </sup> <n>prison</n> רֹאֶ֤ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>looked</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to any</n> מְא֙וּמָה֙ <sup>3972 </sup> <n>not to any thing</n> בְּיָד֔וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>[that was] under his hand</n> בַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>because</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>because the LORD</n> אִתּ֑וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> וַֽאֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>and whatever</n> ה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> עֹשֶׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>was with him and [that] which he did</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> מַצְלִֽיחַ׃ <sup>6743 </sup> <n>made [it] to prosper</n> ס
